Clarissa needs full access to your calendar to create, view, and manage events on your behalf.
Clarissa needs access to your calendar to create, view, and manage events on your behalf.
Clarissa needs to create calendar events on your behalf.
Clarissa uses the camera to capture photos and scan documents for text recognition, object identification, and other visual analysis.
Clarissa needs access to your contacts to help you find and reference contact information.
Clarissa needs your location to provide weather information and location-based assistance.
Clarissa needs your location to provide weather information and location-based assistance.
Clarissa uses the microphone for voice input so you can speak your messages.
Clarissa needs access to your photos to analyze images you select for text recognition, object identification, and other visual analysis.
Clarissa needs full access to your reminders to create and manage tasks on your behalf.
Clarissa needs access to your reminders to create and manage tasks on your behalf.
Clarissa uses speech recognition to convert your voice into text for the conversation.
